item.title: Zombies on the Walls: Why Does So Much New Abstraction Look the Same? - Slideshow - Vulture
About
item.description: More about me on my blog. We are drowning in information, but lost for meaning. The Internet is the best, but also, the worst thing that has happened to the written word. The Internet opened the world to underrepresented groups of society, letting them speak their minds Yet, it also gave savvy opportunists a platform to sell everyone anything at all times, disguising it behind what looks like clever writing.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: At ReadWorthy, accessible from https://readworthy.preslav.me, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Random Bits of Wisdom and how we use it. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in ReadWorthy.
